name: ChainPOP
description:
Simple game made for testing some ideas. Dodge the squares and build up chain reactions.

The higher the amount of enemies destroyed, the higher the muliplier. On a 20+, get an extra life!

If you could fill this form after playing, I would be incredibly happy!

Form in English               /                Formulário em Português

Music is ⒽⒾⒹⒹⒺⓃ^𝓁𝒾𝓂𝒶, by £âïn

Controls:

Movement: A and D, or arrows

Shoot: Space Bar

Pause: Esc

Reset: R
